Jedna z najgorszych gier tego typu. Twórcy gry jedyne patche jakie dają to kolejne płatne DLC. Nie naprawiają błędów. Rozgrywka postawiona na zabójców którzy mogą tunelować (specjalnie biegać i wieszać jedną osobe nie przejmując się resztą) oraz "kampić" czyli wieszają człowieka i stoją pod hakiem czekając ąz on umrze. Proponował bym jakiejś spoko firmie wykupienie tej gry i doprowadzenie jej do stanu używalności. A co do graczy totalnie nie warto marnować na to czasu, chyba że właśnie wkurzyli Cie w pracy/szkole i masz ochotę poznęcać się nad innymi graczami jako zabójca bo mimo zgłoszeń że kampiusz czy tunelujesz twórcy i tak Cie nie zbanują ani nie ukarzą xD
THis is a great fucking game. Ez pallet stun, GEN Rush, BM, Surv can end the game in 3 mins . I love this game:)
Игра достаточно неплохая, но присутствуют косяки, без этого никуда... А так игра норм )))

Very one sided game - toxic community. 
This is how your games will look like:
- as killer you will get survivors trolling you, clicking flashlights and block you
- as survivor you will most likley get a killer facecamping and tunneling you

In my opinion, a game should grant you a good time, where this game just makes you angry

I clearly recommend to look for another game! This isnt worth your time

I have over 150 hours in this game and all I can say is that I still enjoy it as much as the first time I've picked it up. Sure, it isn't the perfect game but the community and characters are unique. Although you may wait for 5-10+ minutes just to get tunneled as a survivor or get flashed/teabagged as a killer. So yes, its frustrating as hell but thats what makes it all so rewarding.

DbD運営はしっかりしてほしいのだが、人種差別が横行してる。韓国人が嫌がらせしてくるゲームであることを認識してほしい。韓国人っぽかったらちょっと警戒することをオススメする。脱出させないよう仕向けてくるぞ。サバイバーなら脱出スイッチの前に居座り日本人の脱出を阻害してくる。そして試合後にかならず日本人への差別発言をしてくる。運営はこういう奴らBANGする仕組みを作れ。レイシストを野放しにするな！ゲームでこういうことを言わなきゃいかんとは悲しいが、それが現実だ。

今天也是给恶灵打工的一天
AMAZING GAME WITH FACE CAMPING TRAPPERS ON LOW RANKS

People act like pieces of shit, and the developers don't care about their game. They don't listen to community input, and ignore the people they hand-pick as representatives for the community. They do their own thing and always mess up their updates. They disabled the map that came with the resident evil chapter for 3 months after the chapter released, and it's still absolute garbage because the map is too big. They won't resize it, because again, they don't listen to anyone. They don't care what the community wants, and when they fix one thing, they make 2 other things incomprehensibly broken. They claimed to have fixed dedicated server issues, yet people still get hit by the killer when they shouldn't.

As angry as this game makes me I still like to play it when I get the chance. With the wide variety of characters you'll have a blast learning about each one works whether it be survivor or killer. While the suvivors don't have unique abilities like killers, they have their own special perks that are bound to them until you get them as unlockables. With that in mind you definitely need to play the game a lot and this game is not that very friendly to beginners especially if you play by yourself. Though after a couple of hours you'll get the general idea of how to play either killer or survivor. How you improve will be up to you as you'll need to figure out what you're doing wrong and take it from there one step at a time.

I still play it, but it's really stressful. It's fun when playing with friends, but it's difficult finding other survivors who don't rage quit. I play both sides, and killer currently is easier, wins more often, and has the advantage. New updates make this advantage higher usually as the amount of killers has to be high to account for the number of survivors. Can't really recommend it as a game despite 400 hours because it's not really "fun" more than not, so I can't imagine a new player enjoying it or any player in the long term. I have had this game since it came out, and take frequent long stretches of breaks because of how much more stressful this game can be than fun.
